name: Authentications To Important Apps Using Single Factor Authentication
description: Detect when authentications to important application(s) only required single-factor authentication
author: MikeDuddington, '@dudders1'

detection.query: selection: {"Status": "Success", "AppId": "Insert Application ID use OR for multiple", "AuthenticationRequirement": "singleFactorAuthentication"}

falsepositives: If this was approved by System Administrator.
